name: Mission: Virus
description:
In Mission:Virus, you follow the adventures of Viri, a deadly viral agent through some poor schmoe's bloodstream, in his quest for total bodily Domination!

Battle White Blood Cells, and find your way toward other arteries, in this nintendo-hard retro platformer.

Controls:

Jump: Space

Grow: W key/Left Mouse Button

Shrink: S key/Right Mouse Button

Restart: R key/ Middle Mouse Button

This game was made during Ludum Dare 38, from Friday night up till Monday 5pm by a group of total n00bs!!!

Please Enjoy!

This is Just a PROTOTYPE - We will be updating and improving on it on the following weeks. Please gives a shout. Thanks for trying it out!

Programmers: Matias Irusta & Andrés Micalizzi

Art & UI: Mauricio Diaz

Music & SFX: Diego Mortenssen

Level Design ¿? - Diego Mortenssen

San Luis - Argentina - 2017

PS: as of this time, we are planning on going back to the drawing board and further develop the game. XD

We'd love to hear your opinions and suggestions, so please leave them in the comments!
